title: eCommerce Web Page Development: HTML-Based Self-Directed Tutorial Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners acquire eCommerce web page development through hands-on, self-directed tutorials, with a secondary goal of collecting feedback for developing an automated misconception diagnosis and hyperlink error correction support system.

learning_goals: Learners can independently implement an eCommerce-specific web page (product listings, shopping cart, payment page, etc.) using HTML tags.
Learners can follow step-by-step tutorial guidance to create a page applying web accessibility and responsive design principles.
Learners can diagnose hyperlink errors and layout issues and correct them with at least 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
